metadataAttributes.Title: Become a CBRS Certified Professional Installer by Google
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This six-module program, developed by Google, will train you to be a Certificated Professional Installer (CPI) of radios which utilize the Citizens Broadband Radio Service (CBRS) band to provide communications infrastructure. You can expect to leave this training with the skills you need to get started as a Certified Professional Installer.
